title: A defence of the doctrine touching the spring and weight of the air propos'd by Mr. R. Boyle in his new physico-mechanical experiments, against the objections of Franciscus Linus ; wherewith the objector's funicular hypothesis is also examin'd, by the author of those experiments.
author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
publisher: Printed by F.G. for Thomas Robinson ...,
notes: This work contains the first formulation of Boyle's law.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
